attribution: Designed by 2021 World Champion Patrick Gower
stripped_text: Lose click click: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed Runner card. Subroutine Remove 1 card in the heap from the game. Subroutine You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. Subroutine End the run.
text: Lose [click][click]: Break up to 2 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed Runner card. [subroutine] Remove 1 card in the heap from the game. [subroutine] You may install 1 card from HQ or Archives. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Ansel 2.0
